other_tests.findings: Appendix measures 7 mm in diameter with mild surrounding fat stranding; appendix is mildly hyperemic. Presence of air in the distal appendix, possibly small amount of oral contrast; no evidence of perforation or abscess. Cyst in right lower pole of kidney (1.2 cm) but no hydronephrosis. No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy. Sigmoid diverticulosis without diverticulitis.
